reports.title: Most frequent pathogens of Category Virus
reports.query: MATCH (v:pathogen) WHERE v.taxonomy contains "virus" RETURN split(v.taxonomy, "; ")[0] + "; " +  split(v.taxonomy, "; ")[1] as domain, COUNT(split(v.taxonomy, "; ")[0] + "; " +  split(v.taxonomy, "; ")[1]) as count ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Top 10 Disease Categories
reports.query: MATCH (d:disease) RETURN d.disease_category, COUNT(d.disease_category) as count ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10;

reports.title: Infectious diseases can be caused by viruses, bacteria or eukaryota
reports.query: MATCH (v:pathogen) RETURN split(v.taxonomy, "; ")[0] as domain, COUNT(split(v.taxonomy, "; ")[0]) as count ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Usage of prednisolone sodium phosphate in Various Disease Categories
reports.query: MATCH (dr:drug) -[]->(di:disease) WHERE dr.name="Prednisolone sodium phosphate" RETURN  di.disease_category, count(di.disease_category) as count ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10;

reports.title: Details about some pathogens
reports.query: MATCH (p:pathogen) -[r:causes]->(di:disease) RETURN p.name, COUNT(r) as count ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10;

reports.title: Diseases Cured By Hydroxychloroquine Sulphate
reports.query: MATCH a=(dr:drug) -[]->() WHERE dr.name contains "Hydroxychloroquine" RETURN a

reports.title: Top 10 Multi Purpose Drugs
reports.query: MATCH (dr:drug) -[r:treats]->(di:disease) RETURN dr.name as drug, COUNT(r) as count ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10;

reports.title: Lung & Infectious Diseases Cured By Prednisolone sodium phosphate
reports.query: MATCH a=(dr:drug) -[]->(di:disease)<-[]-(pa:pathogen) WHERE dr.name="Prednisolone sodium phosphate" AND (di.disease_category = "Lung disease" or di.disease_category="Infectious disease") RETURN  a

reports.title: All Diseases Cured By Prednisolone sodium phosphate
reports.query: MATCH a=(dr:drug) -[]->(di:disease) WHERE dr.name="Prednisolone sodium phosphate"RETURN a
